name: Infinity
headline: Business banking for cross-border SMBs & Startups
description: Infinity is a banking and payments platform for cross-border businesses in India. We help our customers make cross-border payments that are 70% cheaper than traditional methods and earn income on idle cash by investing in government securities.

founders.name: Sourav Choraria, Founder
founders.description: Sourav is the founder & CEO of Infinity, a business banking platform for cross-border SMBs. Prior to Infinity, Sourav co-founded ClinMD(2016), healthcare data analytics company. Sourav was former head of growth at Paytm Money, India's largest wealth management platform and scaled it to 20 million MAU. He also launched India's first FD-backed secured credit card and scaled it to 100,000 users in 1 year.

founders.name: Sidharth Choraria, Founder
founders.description: Was previously an Amazon engineer and PM working on Appstore. Launched Amazon Appstore  IAP module (equivalent to Google Billing Library) used by app developers to monetise digital goods. Developed an instant electronic payment system to pay out app developers across 135 countries. Founding engineer of Paytm Travel & Platform Engineer at MakeMyTrip,developing systems to handle 100M daily requests. CS grad from Birla Institute of Technology & MBA in Finance from Indian School of Business.

Discover the wide variety of functionalities we provide to help you and your business gain clarity and grow to better heights.
Personalized Treasury management
Extend your runway by earning interest income on your idle cash.
Explore curated portfolios, government securities, liquid mutual funds, and fixed deposits to optimize cash reserves and drive financial success. Safe, Secure and Liquid.

Cross Border Payments
Go Global, with access to multi-currency accounts 
Global is the new local. Open multi-currency account within minutes. Enjoy savings on international payments, up to 3x cheaper than banks.

generated_description:
### Company Overview: Infinity

**Name:** Infinity  
**Founded:** 2023  
**Location:** Bengaluru, India   
**Team Size:** 7 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch:** W24  
**Funding:** Recently secured $1.9M to enhance cross-border payment solutions.

**Mission:** Infinity is on a mission to revolutionize business banking for cross-border SMBs (Small and Medium-sized Businesses) and startups. 

### What We Do:

Initially launched as a fintech company, Infinity provides a banking and payments platform specifically tailored for cross-border businesses in India. Here‚Äôs how we stand out:

- **Cost-Effective Payments:** Our platform enables users to make cross-border payments that are **70% cheaper** than traditional banking methods.
- **Earning Potential on Idle Cash:** Customers can invest their idle cash in government securities, generating a return instead of letting funds sit unused.
- **Connected Banking:** Manage multiple bank accounts from a single interface, making it seamless to track transactions and balances in real-time. 
- **Multi-Currency Support:** Businesses can open multi-currency accounts rapidly and enjoy savings on international payments‚Äîup to **three times cheaper** than conventional methods.
- **Auto Reconciliation:** Simplifies accounting by syncing with existing accounting software, ensuring no records are missed.

### Products/Features:

1. **Personalized Treasury Management:** Users can explore high-yield options such as government securities and liquid mutual funds to maximize cash reserves safely.
2. **Global Payment Solutions:** Open up to four bank accounts without the hassle of juggling multiple apps.
3. **User-Centric Dashboard:** An intuitive dashboard allows users to manage accounts, payments, investments, and reconciliations all in one place.

### Target Audience:
Infinity is tailored for startups and SMBs engaged in international business, helping them navigate the complexities of cross-border finances with ease.

**Website:** [Infinity](https://www.infinityapp.in/)

**Backed By:** Tom Blomfield is a notable group partner associated with Infinity, underscoring the credibility and potential of the startup.

### Why Choose Infinity?
Forward-thinking businesses are already leveraging Infinity‚Äôs platform to optimize their financial operations. Our clients appreciate the ease of use, simplicity, and security we offer, as illustrated by positive testimonials:

- **Ankit Kothari, Wishcare:** "Infinity has helped us manage our cash better."
- **Arijit Biswas, EnrichAI:** "With Infinity‚Äôs easy-to-use Treasury product, I am able to put idle cash to good use."
- **Vardhaman Jain, Spares n Equipments:** "It‚Äôs simple, easy, and secure."

### Conclusion
Infinity is not just another fintech company; it's a solution crafted out of the insights gained from understanding the unique challenges faced by cross-border businesses. As the landscape of international commerce evolves, Infinity positions itself as a key player in empowering startups and SMBs to thrive in a global economy.

In short, Infinity is a powerful tool for those looking to simplify their financial management while maximizing returns on their cash. The future of cross-border business banking seems bright with us.
